Uses of Class
bomberman.engine.Level

  • Packages that use Level 
    Package Description
    bomberman.engine  

    • Uses of Level in bomberman.engine

      Methods in bomberman.engine with parameters of type Level 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Bomberman.checkCollisionsSide(float x, float y, Level level)
      Checks for collisions left and right.It checks for half of the bomberman sprite height if that sprite intersects a blocked element of the level.
      boolean Bomberman.checkCollisionsUpDown(float x, float y, Level level)
      Checks for collisions up and down.It checks for the bomberman sprite width if any pixel intersects a blocked element of the level.
      void Monster.checkIfIsAlive(Level level)
      Function responsible for checking the alive status of the monster.It checks if he has died to a bomb.
      void Bomberman.checkIfIsAlive(Level level)
      Function responsible for checking the alive status of the bomberman.It checks if he has died to a bomb or to a monster.
      boolean Monster.checkMonsterCollisionsSide(float x, float y, Level level)
      Checks for collisions left and right.It checks for the monster sprite height if that sprite intersects a blocked element of the level.
      boolean Monster.checkMonsterCollisionsUpDown(float x, float y, Level level)
      Checks for collisions up and down.It checks for the monster sprite width if any pixel intersects a blocked element of the level.
      void Bomberman.checksForPowerUp(Level level)
      Function responsible for checking if there is powerUps in the actual position of the bomberman.It there is its checks for its type.
      void Bomb.explode(Level level)
      Function responsible for exploding a bomb.
      boolean Monster.isBlocked(float x, float y, Level level)
      Function responsible for checking the value of the pixel of the level on the collisions matrix.
      boolean Bomberman.isBlocked(float x, float y, Level level)
      Function responsible for checking the value of the pixel of the level on the collisions matrix.
      void PinkBomberman.move(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc, int delta, Level level)
      Function responsible for the movement of the pink bomberman.
      void Bomberman.move(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc, int delta, Level level)
      Function responsible for the movement of the bomberman.
      void Monster.move(int delta, Level level)
      Function responsible for the movement of the monster
      void Monster.moveMonster(int delta, Level level)
      Function responsible for calculating the random monster movement.

      Constructor and Description
